listitem.para: Specify specify user, password, hostname, port and topic at once as a URL. The URL must be in the form: mqtt(s)://[username[:password]@]host[:port]/topic or ws(s)://[username[:password]@]host[:port]/path
Depending on the scheme, the port will default to different values. mqtt:// - 1883, mqtts:// - 8883, ws:// - 80, wss:// - 443.
